Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Pipe
Description: Moderately well preserved Turkish-style pipe, light brick-red and pinkish brown in colour, with a glossy surface. The stem of the pipe has broken off diagonally, just in front of the bowl of the pipe where there is a pointy protuberance above the hole of the stem. There are regular incisions on the flat circular surface of the bowl. The stem of the conduit of the pipe starts on the underside of the  bowl.
